export const CreatePasswordComponent = ({ password, setPassword, confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword, passwordPlaceholder, handlePasswordClick, handlePasswordBlur, confirmPlaceholder, handleConfirmClick, handleConfirmBlur, handleNextClick, passwordMismatchError, showPassword, togglePassword }) => { return (

Create a strong password

Create a strong password with a mix of letters, numbers and symbols

{passwordMismatchError &&

Those passwords didn’t match. Try again.

}
{/* BG circle */}
); }
